name: bow (UP2008098)
description:
Use the Space Bar to shoot arrows and to get back into the game quickly.

This is my first attempt at using Unreal Engine for a game project. Initially I wanted to add alot more visual elements such as a projectile trajectory beam, or UV painting the bow and arrows, but I would 100% run out of time if I were to do that.  

As you accumulate more points, the target becomes much harder to hit. In the future I was planning to introduce a feature where the arrow trajectory would also change, but that hasn't been implemented in the final cut due to bugs.

Let me know if you have any feedback!
